name: PowerCenter:Prefer SQL transformation's Query mode rather than Script mode
description: List all transformations with script mode
output:
This report lists all Mappings, Mapplets and Folders having script mode.
It provides the following information:
Mapping or Mapplet or Folder full name, Transformation full name
rationale: For maintenability reason and deployment ease, it is important to keep the source code and the configuration inside the PowerCenter repository. SQL transformation in script mode reference external source code. Therefore, avoid using the script mode.
total: Total number of Mappings, Mapplets and Folders having SQL transformation
